title: ME Controller
desc:
Post 2447
Whenever you have 3 coal and 3 iron points you may replace any block on the board with this
While standing on, every turn draw a <:builder:1119843481700012103>. It is **Ethereal**.
Up to 5 <:builder:1119843481700012103> can be played on this block.
This block gains all powers of <:builder:1119843481700012103> played on it, up to 2 randomly every turn.
While standing on, you may place **ME Cable** (2448) by using 1 coal, 1 iron, 1 emerald or 1 quarz point on a tile adjacent to a **ME Controller** or **ME Cable** (2448). This will replace the tile.
